Ok this is going to be tough to write a review for this game as this game is... honestly? It's a shit storm. Now I don't mean like it's horrible or anything like that, but the community itself at least a good chunk of it is WHY I say this, constant fights against the others side, name calling, toxicity, things like that. 

I'm just gonna stick to the game itself and try to be as unbiased as possible.

Have there been any bugs since I've played this? Looking at my hours, it would be tough to say that the game is perfect and has no bugs, however the only bugs I've experienced were WAAAAY in the early days of this game and the devs? Pretty nice people, trying to fix bug mistakes the second they learn about it, just that they give the update to it a while later somewhat causing different bugs, but hey progammers know that pain. Can't make anything perfect.

So how about gameplay? Well it's a 4 v 1... well no, more like it's suppose to be a 1 v 1 v 1 v 1 v 1 in some instances but more times than not 4 v 1, either play as a killer or 1 of 4 survivors trying to kill the survivors, or escape from the killer.  Perks that help with escaping, with killing, for being un noticed, and general things that help in the game. So the areas you play it in are randomized, but there's always like a... "base" kit so to say to help keep your bearings somewhat and a general idea of where some things are. Many different killers to choose from that fit how you play. Survivors are more or less "skins" however at least get all of the characters to level 40, that way you can get that characters "Perks" to help in the game itself. 

There's... not much to say in story, as it's just a multiplayer, player vs player interaction, though there is some character backstory to HOW they got into this situation, for the survivors and killers themselves and some for certain items. 

Can you get your moneys worth? Ok for the base game, it comes with 5... 6 survivors at base, And 5 killers with different playstyles, and able to unlock ther killers or survivors just from playing the game a bunch, and all for just $20 american dollars, which is pretty cheap. Most of the dlc is just 1 killer, and 1 survivor for like.. 7 dollars, which isn't much if you don't WANT to sink a lot of hours just to unlock one or the other, though im not saying TO buy the dlc if you buy it, just if you enjoy the game but want to play as a different killer or want to play as a new survivor, that option is available to you.

TL;DR $20 Dollars were well spent, DLC is there incase you want it, still a toxic community

В игре нет сильного маньяка, есть слабые выжившие. Жалобы на кемпинг - удел либо идиотов, либо новичков. Нет плохой или неправильной тактики маньяка, есть тухленькая тактика выживших.
1. Повесил маньяк тушку на крючок и кемперит - чините генераторы и благополучно сваливайте.
2. Никакого дисбаланса в игре не обнаружил. Всё зависит от навыков игроков.
3. Чтобы находилась игра за маньяка, ставьте другие регионы в настройках "Загрузки" в Steam.
4. Всем рекомендую! И помните, если вы проиграли, это не значит что маньяк подонок и использовал имбалансную тактику, а то что вы идиоты.

Summary : Dead by Daylight is a survival horror that places you in a group of 4 survivors before avoiding the assaults of a killer. You can choose to embody one of the members of the survivor group or the killer himself in levels generated in a random way. This game is really fun but the fact it has not a matchmaking ( sometimes, it's really unbalanced ) and an in-game chat is annoying...

Okay,so many many things has changed since its release.
+ Time waiting on getting "group" is much much faster now
+ No more infinitys (there are some spots which need rework but I wont count them as such)
+ Many new addons/perks which make game much more interesting
+ New killers and new Survivors
+ New content come very offten
+ Very active game developers (and by that I mean they do fast mini patches with which they fix things in game)
+ Free DLC with killer and new map
+ DLC's are actualy cheap
+ If you got friends who own this game you can get alot of fun by playing against eachother

- well there always must be something,and by that I would add that sometimes killer manage to hit you through the barricade even after they got stuned

And thats basicly it. At this current state,I would vote game for 8.5/10

. N'écoutant que mon courage et également par curiosité, j'ai décidé de craquer pour ce jeu que je possède que depuis jeudi dernier et déjà un quotat de 15 heures de jeu ; je peux désormais donner un avis constructif autour de ce soft. Avec le système Steam, on trouve des titres inédits et incroyablement intéressant alors que je suis un joueur arcade et consoles de salon.
. Pour les plus anciens d'entre nous, on se souvient des films de style slasher des années 1980. Quelle est la définition de ce terme anglophone ? Les slashers sont généralement des films d'horreur où l'on retrouve souvent une bande d'adolescents qui se font tuer les uns après les autres par un tueur en série (ou parfois autre chose) qui fait sûrement partie de leur entourage. Cette mode débute en 1978 avec Halloween, La Nuit des Masques. Mais en 1996 Scream renouvelle le slasher movie en apportant plus de fun[style à revoir] et de gore.
Durant la décennie 2000, le slasher se fait, plus rare laissant place à des films beaucoup plus violents appelés Torture porn comme Saw ou Hostel.

. Contrairement aux précédents évaluations, je ne serais pas autant pleinement satisfait de jeu indépendant ; pourtant il se distingue des derniers titres triple A.
Reprenant en principe le jeu Evolve où vous jouez les chasseurs et la proie ; ici ce sont de jeunes survivants qui peuvent être désormais les victimes d'un tueur impitoyable s'inspirant de l'univers des slashers. Mais est-ce là un choix judicieux pour ce petit studio ? Le pari était risqué, cependant le titre Friday13Th a été repoussé et Dead by Daylight risque de plaire, au vu des commentaires élogieux du titre.
Malgré que la réalisation graphique ne rivalise pas face au soft de Turtle Beach (Evolve) ; Dead by Daylight fonctionnera sans doute sur des petites configuration. On recense quelques bugs dans l'environnement, sans grande incidence. Cet aspect grade donne une touche d'angoisse comme si on regardait une vieille cassette VHS. Cela me rappelle des titres comme Nightmare créatures (Beat them all).

. On regrette un mode solo, où on peut compenser le manque de joueurs ; surtout si on joue le tueur. Bien souvent, il a été difficile de trouver une partie. Je tiens à remercier à Z.le muet d'avoir joué avec moi, nous avons pris un pied fou à faire tourner en bourrique Michael Myers (le tueur des films Vendredi 13). 
Ce personnage est malheureusement vendu en DLC, ainsi que d'autres données ; ce qui aboutit à un profond abus, de plus on dirait que le dévelppeur a donné beaucoup trop d'avantages face aux survivants.
Toujours dans les défauts, la montée en exp me semble fastidieuse et un débutant se trouve vite en difficulté sans de précieuses compétences comme saboter plus aisément les pièges à ours par exemple. Alors qu'un jeu comme Depth, tous les joueurs débutent avec le strict minimum de survie, y compris pour les requins, dommage pour ce Dead by Daylight.

. Malgré de nombreux défauts, le titre arrive à convaincre, car il propose un univers prenant, doté d'une ambiance sonore incroyable. Vous apprécierez le cri de votre victime qui se traine sur le sol pour un tueur sadique. On remarque un grand nombre d'assasins assistant à la mort des survivants, nuisant la possibilité de sauver ce compagnon.
Le titre peut être idéal pour jouer en équipe, en effet afin de sortir de cet enfer, vous devez réparer des générateurs dans la carte, de plus il est possible de soigner vos comparses. C'est vraiment un bon délire qu'on joue le monstre à la tronconneuse ou bien l'infirmière hystérique, chaque camp trouve son compte. 
Le gameplay à la manette ne pose pas de problème, mieux il est idéal pour réaliser les QTE, vous appuyez sur une touche au bon moment pour valider l'action.

. Avec un peu plus de soins et des mises à jour régulière, ainsi qu'une écoute des joueurs, Day by Daylight demeure un titre sympathique et il se complète parfaitement avec Depth.
Son ambiance unique et son principe apporte un pur moment de détente (façon de parler) ; profitez d'une promotion pour vous procurer ce titre.

时隔两年再次评测，杀机仍然是一款不可多得的好游戏，但是目前来看，两年一直在削弱人类的上限，没法秀了这游戏就真的乐趣不多了，我觉得更应该去想办法控制速修和守尸，这样才能够提高体验，被溜不能怪人类，人类不溜屠夫只当躲猫猫来玩，这游戏真的不适合这样的背景设定，原来那么多人喜欢杀机，最主要的是看到大佬们秀，各种溜，各种蛇皮走位，人类和屠夫之间的博弈，现在屠夫只要死追，没有追不死的人皇，屠夫根本不需要套路，死追就行了，原来屠夫靠死追很难杀人，屠皇都是靠各种套路，让人皇挨刀，这样的博弈才是杀机真正的乐趣，而不是炖蘑菇，虽然各有各的玩法，但是一款游戏要想长久的火下去，秀的上限绝对不能降低。

现在是可以改名了，叫时间竞速，刚刚挂上 一个人，3台电机就修好了，，怎么玩，遇到会溜屠夫的，你一个还没挂直接亮门，对于高段位的屠夫可能没啥，但是对于我们这种技术菜的游戏体验贼差，还有今天4-11日更新后打屠夫你挂死两个，挂了3次，也是掉段，不知道怎么制作组怎么想的，本来修的就快，还上分贼难，可能是我太菜了，纯属个人意见，现在这游戏不推荐萌新入手，第一萌新低段位匹配的贼慢，第二你要是打屠夫的话就做好一局全在找人好不容易找到一个2个电机修好了，好不容易砍了一刀又一个电机修好了，好不容易砍倒地了，抱起来一个打击跑了，又砍到再抱一个激光剑（手电筒）成瞎子，然后电机开完，4人嘲讽着离开 ，出来还再嘲讽这屠夫真菜，全图溜！就是一句话，新手别买，高手随意，如果买的话建议玩人类，屠夫千万别玩！

I've been following this game since its early beta, and watched it through friends on streams for a while. It can be a lot of fun, or it can be a total disappointment. 
Starting out in this game can be beyond frustrating. Prepare to get beat, and beat badly early on and often. The match making in this game is non-existant from my experience. Both for the killer, and survivor. My suggestion to new killers is to play Michael Myers as he is in a lesser term, unfair. Otherwise you are forced to play to lvl 15+ in an attemp to improve with perks to give you an advantage. Playing survivor without friends is extremely difficult as well, as team coordination is usually abyssmal. Until they find a way to make the game easier for newer players to play and succeed. The fun potential this game has...is masked by the loathful Match Making system.

I came into this game like so many others because of the Halloween movie DLC which happened to be on sale.  I had heard of the game before but figured it would be too difficult for me to be any good at so why get amped for something I'd just be frustrated with and not play.

I'll admit, my first few playthroughs were pitiful; although, changing the key bindings helped that tremendously as I play with with an XBox360 controller.  I was lucky enough to make friends with someone who talked me through the game and showed me the ropes, I'm barely at 15 hours played total in 2 weeks and I love this game.

Yes, killers who camp (stake out a hooked victim as bait for other survivors) is lame AF and I have no idea how that can ever been addressed with any finality - we will always have some players that suck that way, regardless of their experience.  

Overall, if you stick with it and hang in there, you'll find a rhythm of playing that is right for you.  At the beginning I was instantly a hide and watch kind of player, now after watching a few expert streamers on Twitch, I get right in there and pitch in with generators. Teamwork makes the dream work after all.

Good luck and add me if you want to play sometime.  I give this game a solid 8.5 out of 10.  Always room for improvement but I'm  very impressed.

[h1] DBD is a rough gem that remains unpolished by its creator[/h1]

This review mainly focuses on the longevity of the product, and its devolpers incompetence. If you are new player wondering if this product will get you XX  hours of gameplay, the answer is yes due to the progression system being grindy as hell to even get a taste of what the game has to offer. Basic gameplay is fun enough to keep you on the hamster wheel for a while until you figure why you start to hate the game.

"So why are you giving it a thumbs down?"

Basically the game should have never released as full-release, rather than being early-access title. DBD is one of those titles that you want to check out maybe in 6-24 months to see if the devs ever managed to figure out how to fix their game.

So, backtracking 5 months, DBD has open beta period of one or two weeks and then launches 14th of June 2016. Almost all of the complaints survive to release version, many of them are unfixed to this date. If i was to give you a complete list of all the faults that required / still require fixing, this review would become too long to read. Devolpers have SLOWLY started to figure that major bugs need be fixed when they pop out after every patch, but still have no answer to core problems of the game outside of bugs that they are still trying to hammer down:

Design flaws include such things as bad map making (Google: DBD Infinites), basic mechanics ranging from tolerable to unfair at times (Google: DBD Pallets, Hook camping), perks being just badly designed or just flat out broken good (flavor of the month OP perks such as NOED, Decisive strike, Self-heal, Sprint Burst, Sabotage just to mention few that had their fair share of crying). The game has 2 DLC killers released in 5 months, and already one of them is completely cannibalizing one of the original killers, simply being upgraded version of him. Poor wraith :(.

Unfair gameplay makes community pure salt. If survivors are broken sometimes due to re-balancing, playing killer is simply not fun and killer players cry. If Killers get something good for a change, survivors will cry till they get nerfed. The cycle is endless. Game will never have positive community.

It took 5 months for the devs to realize just one of the broken designs and start figuring out a fix for it, at this speed the game is fully fleshed out sometime in 2018. Wasted potential is stamped all over this game.
Was a pretty fun game to play with friends. Worth a try if you have the cash.
Игра пережила многое и стала лучше, еще многое нужно сделать, но проект прошел испытание временем и выжил, как минимум стоит того чтобы попробовать!

Ich empfehle es weiter!

Meine kurze Review:


+Level-  und Ausrüstungssystem sehr gut (d.h. wie man levelt oder Perks, Opfergaben usw. erhält)
+Macht einfach soo viel Spaß, 
+Steuerung einfach zu bedienen,
+bis jetzt nur "nette" Killer gehabt, dass heißt, sie haben teils gecampt, teils nicht, trotzdem auf alle Fälle fair gespielt.

Denn wer sich über Camper aufregt: Lasst es einfach, es ist nur ne andere Spielweise, die ich selbst zwar nicht nutze, aber bei anderen respektiere, man kann trotzdem noch mit nem Fluchtversuch oder Ablenkungsmanöver entkommen, klar schwieriger, aber nicht unmöglich :)

Die Entwickler bringen regelmäßig Updates raus, dass heißt nicht nur Bug-Fixes sondern auch neue Killer, Überlebende usw. und seit ein paar Tagen funktionieren bei mir auch die Deutschen Server (Match-Making), müsst euch also nicht mehr auf die russischen Server verkrümmeln ^-^

Lohnt sich auf jeden Fall für 19,99€, mit dem Wissen, wie das Spiel ist, hätte ich auch 60€ ausgegeben.
The most exciting horror game I've played. Involves a lot of teamwork and fun to play with friends
